wkf-model.name: Event Gateway

targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" xs:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL BPMN20.xsd" camunda:code="BPM-13" camunda:diagramName="Event Gateway" camunda:wkfStatusColor="blue" camunda:appBuilder="BPM-13"> <bpmn2:process id="Process_Event_Gateway" name="Event Gateway" isExecutable="true"> <bpmn2:extensionElements> <camunda:processConfiguration>
